sentences.en: Advertisements, perhaps , are most omnipresent in big cities such as Shanghai.
sentences.cn: 广告在许多大城市如上海是无处不在,无时不有.

sentences.en: AW : Yes , into an omnipresent mesh.
sentences.cn: 是的, 进入一张无所不在的网.

sentences.en: Beauty is omnipresent, therefore everything is capable of giving us joy.
sentences.cn: 美随处可见, 因此每样事物都能给予我们欢乐.

sentences.en: Even despite the winning and the smiles, Iverson's critics are omnipresent.
sentences.cn: 然后胜利和微笑似乎总是不够, 你总能听到对艾弗森的指责.

sentences.en: God is not only omniscient and omnipresent.
sentences.cn: 神不仅仅是无所不知、无所不在的.

sentences.en: I tell you: Holy Spirit is omnipresent, but not in the words.
sentences.cn: 我告诉你: 圣灵无所不在的, 唯独不在言语词句之中.

sentences.en: LIKE a deity , radio spectrum is invisible, omnipresent and commands awesome power.
sentences.cn: 无线电波像神明一样, 无法看到而又无处不在,并拥有让世人敬畏的力量.

sentences.en: Omnipresent broadband access is almost here.
sentences.cn: 无处不在的宽带接入即将来临了.

sentences.en: On Christmas Eve, Santa Claus is omnipresent.
sentences.cn: 在圣诞节前夜, 到处都能见到圣诞老人.

sentences.en: Services; Omnipresent. Omnipotent. The transaction needs of the guests.
sentences.cn: 服务; 无所不在. 无所不能. 需要交易的客人.

sentences.en: The economic globalization rolls in like the tide, which influence omnipresent.
sentences.cn: 经济全球化如浪潮一般滚滚而来, 其影响无所不在.

sentences.en: The obsessive thoughts became so omnipresent that her memory was affected.
sentences.cn: 这些强迫性念头变得无时不在，以至影响到了她的记忆。

sentences.en: The sound of sirens was an omnipresent background noise in New York.
sentences.cn: 在纽约，警报声是无处不在的背景噪音。

sentences.en: These days the media are omnipresent.
sentences.cn: 现在新闻媒体无处不在。

sentences.en: These distinctions are omnipresent in the current literature.
sentences.cn: 这些区别在当前的著作中是无所不在的.

sentences.en: With love Peh Chinhua discovers the omnipresent beauty in this world.
sentences.cn: 白振华的诗有着睿智的哲思和生活的智慧.

words.tran_cn: 无所不能的；全能的；有无限权力的

trans.tran_cn: 无所不在的，同时遍在的，无往不在
